segments.text: What a disastrous kitchen this is turning into.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the overflowing sink is ruining the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The poor woman doesn't even realize the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so absorbed in her dish-drying, it's heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window offers a view of a serene garden, untouched by this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the boy's on that unstable stool, risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling cookies from the jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate in his other hand might not save him if it tips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame they're sneaking like this, could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's slippery now with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would notice and stop it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
